name: dwm-bar
desc: A modular statusbar for the DWM window manager written in POSIX-compliant shell script. Featured on suckless.org with over 200 stars on GitHub. Including features such as weather, time, Spotify, and network.

name: 3D Pathfinding
desc: A test environment for comparing 3D pathfinding algorithms in a voxelized environment developed with C# and Unity. Used to gather data for a research project at Coventry University.
